post.body: It snowed most of day in Vegas of all places (happens about every 3 yrs). Sno still on lawn cuz its COLD. Tourists surprisd!
@cottageantiques Even r parents couldn't tell r voices apart. Never played tricks on ppl, tho. Shld have worked that, I guess!
Yur vintage White House cookbook purchase is officially @cottageantique's 1st Twitter-related sale.
Absolutely step outside. You'll see the west side blanketed in snow. Gorgeous!
Will do.
How is COQ10, L-carnitine and Taurine working out 4 yur dogs? I too give 2 my 8-lb heart patient: http://tinyurl.com/6n6lmt
I hear u. Good reason. ... Have fun tree trimming!
Off topic, but ... u changed yur pic. Change of scenery?
Ah but u were always so much wiser.
yur right; @vpynchon got cool stuff 1st including a wooden skateboard, the 1st on the block.
& u listened 2 @cottageantiques and my 1st transistor too (we had to share it). From trans to tweets - is that full circle?
Very cool. Looks like a great group.
Response "Just checking my e-mail" no longer works?
Just resent to your sbcglobal e-mail.
Love it, and the daisy pic -- thnx! Am about to resend bio.
Or perhaps Palin's handlers' bias against incoherency?
Ah, I get it now; pub picked up after previously self-published, & backed out b4 signing on dotted line. Sorry it happned to u.
Thx for RT of landing page which I'm re RT'ing here: http://bit.ly/aHe9
Nah, yur improving all the time. Writing is a craft, not unlike carpentry; the more you do it, the better you get.
Editing others' work actually makes us better writers (at least that's what an editor told me years ago).
2day's my anniv w/ex husband. Prbly shldn't rember but usually do.
Ubiquinone or Ubiquinol ... That is the Question: http://tinyurl.com/5j6qx7
Friend got book offer 2day from small house that's sister biz is newspapr. My advice was take it, pub biz slo. He wants 2 hold out. Shld he?
Snow -- lots of it -- all over the ground in Las Vegas. House & yard r covered. Will take pics to prove it! My dogs r loving it.
Tuned into @MCHammer HammerTime Radio's mad tunes & interviews: http://mchammer.com/
RT @cottageantiques: Just have 2 share orig 1900 White House Cookbook-Pretty cool history & tribute to 1st Ladies http://tinyurl.com/6p5k4j
AP: Bush dodges shoes thrown by angry man during visit 2 Iraq http://tinyurl.com/gf8l4
You'll come up w/ a gud 1! RT @vpynchon: ok; now I'm leaving; but tomorrow is my 1,000 post on the negotiation blog . . . what to DO?????
Thanks, @SonjaCassella
60-mile-an-hr winds in Vegas right now. Downed trees. Snow -- yes, the white stuff -- forecasted for Sunday nite.
I just joined the holistichealth Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/holistichealth You can too.
RT @cottageantiques: Great ezine article on life saving info about Alkalinity vs Acidity http://tinyurl.com/8529go
G'night @vpynchon & @cottageantiques. Twin 2 is signing off too.
I just joined the journalists Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/journalists
Story behind the story of Michael Vick survivor dog Georgia: http://bit.ly/W0aD
Off to Whole Foods for lunch break. Probly a madhouse, but need a kombucha fix.
From MediaBistro, Palin: 'I Was Not Allowed to Do Very Many Interviews' http://bit.ly/4NFW I wonder why.
Finishing article about actress Ali MacGraw and her animal rights/advocacy efforts. It's late; nearly done.
sad
